xuiPager
directive in module xui

Description

XUI Pager component.

Usage

as element:
<xui-pager
       [page="{number}"]
       page-size="{number}"
       total="{function}"
       adjacent="{number}"
       [dots="{string}"]
       [scroll-top="{boolean}"]
       [hide-if-empty="{boolean}"]
       [ul-class="{string}"]
       [active-class="{string}"]
       [disabled-class="{string}"]
       [show-prev-next="{boolean}"]
       [pager-action="{function}"]>
</xui-pager>

Parameters

ParamTypeDetails
page
(optional)
number

Current page number.

page-sizenumber

Count of items displayed on a page. If provided value is different than default page size set: [10, 25, 50 ,100], it will extend possible page sizes and keep in the page-size selection popover.

totalfunction

Total number of items.

adjacentnumber

Number of page links to display adjacent to the current page link (on both sides). This determines the number of maximum displayed links as adjacent*2 + 5.

dots
(optional)
string

The ellipses/dots string to be displayed for access to non-visible page links.

scroll-top
(optional)
boolean

Whether to shift focus to the top of the page.

hide-if-empty
(optional)
boolean

Whether to hide the pager when pageCount <= 1 a single page.

ul-class
(optional)
string

The CSS class for the page numbers.

active-class
(optional)
string

The CSS class for the active page.

disabled-class
(optional)
string

The CSS class for the disable page number.

show-prev-next
(optional)
boolean

Whether to show previous and next buttons.

pager-action
(optional)
function

Callback invoked when on page-changed (page:number, pageSize:number, total:number) => Function to handle page click.
